market_data.price_trend: Stable with slight increase during lean season
market_data.storage_advisory: Store in dry godowns; use hermetic bags for small quantities. Moisture below 14%.

market_data.price_trend: Fluctuates with international demand; sell in January-February for best prices
market_data.storage_advisory: Keep kapas dry and avoid rain damage. Covered storage essential.

market_data.price_trend: Strong demand from poultry and starch industries in Telangana
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry to below 12% moisture. Use metallic bins to prevent weevil damage.

market_data.price_trend: Highly volatile; prices spike during lean season. Telangana chilli has strong export demand.
market_data.storage_advisory: Sun-dry thoroughly. Store in gunny bags in cool dry place. Grade before selling.

market_data.price_trend: Nizamabad is a major turmeric trading hub. Prices depend on curcumin content and quality.
market_data.storage_advisory: Boil, dry and polish before storage. Keep moisture below 10%. Grade by finger and bulb.

market_data.price_trend: Strong MSP support. Government procurement active. Store for better prices post-March.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry well and fumigate. Store in jute bags on wooden pallets.

market_data.price_trend: Good MSP procurement in Telangana. Demand stable due to dal consumption.
market_data.storage_advisory: Moisture below 10%. Use neem leaves as natural pest deterrent in storage.

market_data.price_trend: Linked to international soybean oil prices. Good demand from crushing units.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry below 12% moisture. Avoid heaping to prevent heating.

market_data.price_trend: Stable demand for oil and confectionery. Quality grading affects price significantly.
market_data.storage_advisory: Shell only before sale. In-shell storage lasts longer. Keep dry and ventilated.

market_data.price_trend: Declining area but good prices due to demand for sunflower oil.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry properly. Store in moisture-proof bags.

market_data.price_trend: Price set by Fair and Remunerative Price (FRP). State Advised Price (SAP) may be higher.
market_data.storage_advisory: Harvest and deliver to sugar factory within 24 hours to prevent sucrose loss.

market_data.price_trend: Extremely volatile. Prices can range from Rs 200 to Rs 6000 per quintal. Stagger planting.
market_data.storage_advisory: Highly perishable. Sell within 3-5 days of harvest. Use ventilated crates.

market_data.price_trend: Prices peak in October-November when stored onion runs out. Good cold storage needed.
market_data.storage_advisory: Cure in shade for 10-15 days. Store in well-ventilated structures. Avoid moisture.

market_data.price_trend: Early season Benishan gets premium prices. Quality and ripening uniformity matter.
market_data.storage_advisory: Harvest at mature green stage. Ripen with ethylene or naturally. Use CFB boxes for transport.

market_data.price_trend: Short-duration crop with good returns. High MSP ensures profitability.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry well. Fumigate to prevent bruchid beetle damage.

market_data.price_trend: Growing demand due to millet promotion. Premium for rabi jowar (white grain).
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry below 12% moisture. Store in airtight containers.

market_data.price_trend: Increasing demand as health food. Government promoting millets actively.
market_data.storage_advisory: Store in dry, pest-free conditions. Use hermetic bags for small lots.

market_data.price_trend: Export-oriented oilseed. Prices linked to global castor oil demand.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry properly. Remove damaged seeds before storage.

market_data.price_trend: Steady demand. Grand Naine variety dominates. Prices stable but transport cost matters.
market_data.storage_advisory: Harvest at 75% maturity. Use ripening chambers. Handle carefully to avoid bruising.

market_data.price_trend: Telangana oranges have good local market. Export quality commands premium.
market_data.storage_advisory: Harvest at proper color break stage. Waxing improves shelf life.

market_data.price_trend: Year-round production. Prices fluctuate with supply gluts.
market_data.storage_advisory: Highly perishable. Sell within 2-3 days. Grade by size for better price.

market_data.price_trend: Summer crop gets better prices. Tender pods command premium.
market_data.storage_advisory: Harvest daily. Pre-cool after harvest. Transport in ventilated containers.

market_data.price_trend: Rabi season produces best quality. Prices crash during peak arrivals.
market_data.storage_advisory: Store at 0-2 degrees C. Shelf life 2-3 weeks in cold storage.

market_data.price_trend: Premium in off-season. Early variety fetches 2x normal price.
market_data.storage_advisory: Wrap leaves around curd during field stage. Sell fresh.

market_data.price_trend: Prices spike during summer. Festival season increases demand.
market_data.storage_advisory: Highly perishable. Sell within 24-48 hours. Grade by size and color.

market_data.price_trend: Good export potential. Organic ginger gets premium. Dry ginger more stable.
market_data.storage_advisory: Cure in shade. Store in sand pits for long-term storage.

market_data.price_trend: Premium oilseed. White sesame gets higher price than brown/black.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry thoroughly. Store in cool dry place. Avoid insect damage.

market_data.price_trend: Declining area but niche demand for safflower oil. Good for dryland areas.
market_data.storage_advisory: Dry below 8% moisture. Store in airtight containers.

market_data.price_trend: Two harvest seasons. Prices peak during summer and festivals.
market_data.storage_advisory: Waxing extends shelf life. Grade by size for export.

market_data.price_trend: Red Lady variety dominates. Steady demand for table and processing.
market_data.storage_advisory: Harvest at color-break stage. Handle with care. Use CFB boxes.
